item.title: Profile
item.description: Work Experience Senior Software Engineer @ Peloton | May 2021 - Present Software Engineer @ Yext | March 2017 - April 2021 - Authored a subscription feature RPC service with a 370 Peak QPS - Migrated a legacy Subscriptions with circular dependencies from Yext’s homegrown ICBM build system to Google’s Bazel build system Systems Engineer @ Yext | June 2016 - February 2017 Business Systems Developer @ Intermedia | January 2015 - June 2016

item.title: Tips
item.description: Archive rpm package is a cpio archive. zip -r ../target.zip * - zip recrusively all the content under the current directory to the target.zip unzip -l /path/to/a.zip - list the content of the zip file Fails a bash script on error set -e
